import { Component, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { DataLoginService } from 'src/app/services/data-login.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { nombre: string = 'Sin Nombre'; constructor(private loginServices: DataLoginService){ this.nombre = this.loginServices.nombreUsuario } }
